line.comment: * LU Update (Solarahawk): removed Player code
* LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MDM code
* LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled drones code - drones already handled in base attack script
* Start checking mission parameters, break up operation on this ship, if some condition is not met
* If THIS is docked at the homebase, while wating for some valid target, reduce check interval, else stop hullcheck on THIS
* Speed up undocking process a bit
* Insert another waiting period, while ship is undocking
* Stop checking, if homebase is gone
* Start missile defence on all turrets, if some missile is aiming ship
* do if [THIS]-> is in active sector
* = [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.missile.defence' :
* Get current wing target, rename leader to see which target the wing is currently aiming at (if target exists)
* Check, if wingmates are named correctly (happens sometimes, that a wingship is renamed as leader :/, this is to prevent this)
* Start retreating, when hull or shield reaches critical limits

line.text: '%sIs fleeing, shield limit: %s, hull limit: %s, ship shield: %s, ship hull %s'

line.comment: * If leader is fleeing, give leadership to another ship of the wing
* Remove THIS from flight wing
* Switch name to original shipname, backup wingname
* Start retreating
* Launch drones if necessary
*if ($hull < $hull.limit OR $shield < $shield.limit)
*$task.nr = [THIS]-> get next available task: starting=930
*[THIS]-> begin task $task.nr with script 'anarkis.ads.release.drones' and priority 0: arg1=5 arg2=1212 arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
*end
* End hullcheck, if homebase is gone
* Raise shield limit about 30, max 100%
* As long as THIS is not docked, check, if mission parameters allow rejoin to original wing

line.text: '%sRetreat mode, ship shield: %s, return shield limit: %s, ship hull: %s, return hull limit: %s'

line.comment: * When wing does no longer exist, return ship to carrier
* Start missile defence on all turrets, if some missile is aiming fleeing ship
* do if [THIS]-> is in active sector
* = [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.missile.defence' :
* Remain in retreat mode, as long as given conditions are not met

line.text: '%sIs healthy enough to return fight, ship shield: %s, ship hull: %s'

line.comment: * Build array containing names of active wing ships
* Search for a wingmate name currently not in use
* Reintegrate THIS back into wing
* Search for a wingmate name currently not in use

sval.val: Acc.wing.hullcheck @
%starget: %s, exists: %s, name: %s, wing: %s
%sIs fleeing, shield limit: %s, hull limit: %s, ship shield: %s, ship hull %s
%sClass: %s, was removed from wing, $wing: %s
%sRetreat mode, ship shield: %s, return shield limit: %s, ship hull: %s, return hull limit: %s
%sIs healthy enough to return fight, ship shield: %s, ship hull: %s
%sanarkis.acc.wing.hullcheck ENDED
%sIs renamed to: %s (%s)
LU Update (Solarahawk): removed Player code
LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MDM code
LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled drones code - drones already handled in base attack script
Start checking mission parameters, break up operation on this ship, if some condition is not met
If THIS is docked at the homebase, while wating for some valid target, reduce check interval, else stop hullcheck on THIS
Speed up undocking process a bit
Insert another waiting period, while ship is undocking
Stop checking, if homebase is gone
Start missile defence on all turrets, if some missile is aiming ship
do if [THIS]-> is in active sector
= [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.missile.defence' :
Get current wing target, rename leader to see which target the wing is currently aiming at (if target exists)
Check, if wingmates are named correctly (happens sometimes, that a wingship is renamed as leader :/, this is to prevent this)
Start retreating, when hull or shield reaches critical limits
If leader is fleeing, give leadership to another ship of the wing
Remove THIS from flight wing
Switch name to original shipname, backup wingname
Start retreating
Launch drones if necessary
if ($hull < $hull.limit OR $shield < $shield.limit)
$task.nr = [THIS]-> get next available task: starting=930
[THIS]-> begin task $task.nr with script 'anarkis.ads.release.drones' and priority 0: arg1=5 arg2=1212 arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
End hullcheck, if homebase is gone
Raise shield limit about 30, max 100%
As long as THIS is not docked, check, if mission parameters allow rejoin to original wing
When wing does no longer exist, return ship to carrier
Start missile defence on all turrets, if some missile is aiming fleeing ship
do if [THIS]-> is in active sector
= [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.missile.defence' :
Remain in retreat mode, as long as given conditions are not met
Build array containing names of active wing ships
Search for a wingmate name currently not in use
Reintegrate THIS back into wing
Search for a wingmate name currently not in use
